summary: Build Zenlink (ZENLINK), a modern, calm, anonymous emotional-growth/connection web platform (not social media) with voice-first interactions, AI-driven matching and reflection insights, Growth Circles, challenges, and strong safety/moderation, delivered as a hackathon-ready full-stack MVP with a polished responsive UI.
architectural_notes: Target stack: React + Tailwind CSS frontend; Node.js + Express backend; MongoDB or Firebase DB.
Auth: Firebase Auth with email/phone OTP verification.
Real-time: Socket.io or Firebase Realtime Database.
Design principle: avoid vanity metrics/infinite scroll; prioritize mindful, psychologically safe UX.
known_issues: Build/deploy pipeline is failing with a recurring “Configuration error encountered” message during builds.

existing_features.title: Create a cohesive, modern “dreamy soft-tech” visual theme for ZENLINK and apply it consistently across the landing page and all app screens: dark theme with soft gradients (midnight blue + soft lavender + moon grey), glassmorphism cards, rounded corners, subtle cyan or warm violet accent glow, clean typography, calm micro-interactions/animations, and mobile-first responsive layout.

Implement an anonymous identity and authentication flow using Internet Identity (II) as the only real authentication method, with an onboarding sequence that collects: Terms & Conditions acceptance, anonymous username (with a clear warning not to use real names), avatar selection (symbolic/illustrated), interests, a short “perspective” bio, growth goals selection, optional MBTI test (skip allowed), and an MBTI visibility toggle.

Build the landing page with calming, mature copy and clear positioning that differentiates ZENLINK from social media, anonymous chat apps, and therapy apps; include a primary headline (“Connect Beyond Identity”) and a secondary tagline variant (“A gentle space to be heard.”) with concise product explanation and a single clear call-to-action to sign in.

Create the main app shell with a bottom navigation (mobile) and sidebar (desktop) for: Home, Wall (Global Problem Sharing), Circles, Rooms, Connections, MBTI, Profile, Debate, and Safety/Guidelines. Ensure navigation avoids infinite scrolling patterns and promotes mindful usage (clear page boundaries, “Load more” instead of endless feed).

Build the Home Dashboard as a card/slide-based hub showing: user avatar + anonymous username, Daily Challenge (one per day with gentle progress indicator), Weekly Challenges/Moments entry point, Rooms (discover + create), Circles (your circles + create/join), Weekly Highlights/Top Moments/Top Topics module (recognition without follower/like obsession), and shortcuts to MBTI and Connections.

Implement Growth Circles: users can create a circle, generate/share an invite link/code, join via invite, manage membership up to 8, and access a circle feed that includes guided weekly reflection prompts and circle-only posts/voice notes (voice-first UI).

Implement Rooms as voice-only participation spaces: create room (title + short topic/bio), discover/join rooms, filter/sort by interests and MBTI compatibility, and support posting/listening to voice notes in a room (no required text chat). Include sound-wave visual elements in the UI.

Implement Voice-first 1:1 Chats between connected users using voice-note style messages (push-to-talk UX). Provide guidance copy discouraging personal info sharing, plus Leave chat, Block, and Report actions inside the chat.

Build the Global Problem Sharing Wall: allow anonymous posts (category + text), show posts in a modern card layout with timestamps, allow comments/advice, allow liking helpful comments (not posts), and provide a “Connect Privately” action under a comment that initiates a connection request flow.

Implement the MBTI module: ~20 multiple-choice questions, compute a resulting MBTI type, store privately per user, allow retake, provide a short “learn about your personality” screen, and use MBTI to compute a compatibility percentage when suggesting connections and filtering rooms.

Implement the Connections system: suggest users based on shared interests, growth goals, and MBTI compatibility; allow sending connection requests; allow accept/decline; show existing connections; and ensure suggestions do not reveal real identities (only avatar + anonymous username + optional MBTI visibility).

Create the AI Reflection Assistant as an on-platform heuristic analyzer (no external LLM): analyze a selected conversation thread (circle, room, or chat) and generate structured feedback including tone label, empathy score (0–100), communication suggestions, and growth insights; store reflection history per user and surface it in a Progress Dashboard with growth streaks and emotional-intelligence indicators (no vanity metrics).

Implement Weekly Debate: admin can set one topic per week; users can post voice-first opinions (voice note) with optional short text; allow like and reply to debate responses; display the active weekly topic prominently.

Safety & Moderation MVP: provide community guidelines page, block and report flows across wall/comments/chats/rooms/circles, circle-level privacy controls (invite-only), and basic harmful-word detection filtering on user-entered text fields with a clear, calm error message. Include an admin moderation screen to review reports and take action (e.g., hide content, suspend user).

Seed realistic demo/dummy data for hackathon usability (without requiring multiple real users): sample rooms, sample circles, sample wall posts/comments, sample weekly topic and highlights, and sample challenges; ensure seeded entities are clearly marked as “Demo” in the UI and can be reset from a developer-only control.
Update the Home page welcome heading to replace the text “Welcome back” with “Welcome to your growth space”, while still displaying the user’s anonymous username in the greeting.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create modern, minimal, calming ZENLINK responsive UI (landing + app-ready screens) with dreamy soft-tech dark theme, gradients, glassmorphism cards, rounded corners, smooth animations, and calming microcopy

Implement authentication & onboarding: email/phone OTP, T&C acceptance, anonymous unique user ID/username (warn against real names), avatar/Bitmoji selection, password, interests, short perspective/bio, optional MBTI test + visibility toggle

Home dashboard with card/slide-based blocks: daily challenges, rooms (voice-only), circles, weekly challenges/moments, weekly app-created global moderated room, weekly highlights/top moments/topics, and navigation to core sections
Anonymous identity system: no real names/profile photos; symbolic avatars; privacy-first defaults
AI matching & recommendations: match users by growth goals, interests, personality/MBTI, interaction patterns; recommend rooms/circles/connections; avoid addictive infinite scrolling
Growth Circles feature: small private groups (5–8) with invite links, guided discussions, weekly reflection prompts, and voice-first interaction
Voice-first communication features: voice-only rooms, voice-note style chats (push-to-talk), sound-wave UI elements, and voice-based responses where applicable
AI Reflection Assistant: analyze conversations to provide tone analysis, empathy score, communication suggestions, and growth insights; store reflection history

Personal progress dashboard: growth streaks, emotional intelligence indicators, reflection history, communication development metrics; reward constructive engagement (no likes/followers/vanity metrics)
Global problem sharing wall: anonymous posts, comments/advice, like helpful comments, connect privately CTA, timestamps, modern card layout, demo dummy data
MBTI personality test module: ~20 MCQ, compute type, store privately, compatibility percentage, compatible user suggestions, retake and learn-about screens
Connections system: suggested users, send/accept/decline connection requests, show avatar + username + compatibility, and existing connections list
Private rooms / chat system: real-time messaging (voice-first preferred), leave anytime, no personal info sharing guidance, block/report inside chat
Weekly debate section: admin sets weekly topic, users post opinions, like & reply to responses
Safety & moderation: block/report, community guidelines, harmful-word detection filter, circle-level privacy controls, AI-assisted moderation future-ready, and admin moderation dashboard
Full-stack MVP architecture using React + Tailwind frontend and Node.js/Express backend with MongoDB or Firebase; OTP auth via Firebase Auth; real-time via Socket.io or Firebase Realtime DB

Implement core domain models and persistence in the single Motoko main actor for: Users (anonymous profile), Interests, Growth Goals, MBTI result + visibility, Connections (requests + accepted), Circles (5–8 members, invite code/link), Rooms (voice-only rooms metadata), Posts (global wall), Comments, Weekly Debate topic + responses, Challenges (daily/weekly), Reflections (assistant outputs), Moderation (reports/blocks), and simple admin role.
Update UI greeting microcopy: replace “Welcome back” with “Welcome to your growth space”.
